record.description: The use of a Van de Graaf generator in the treatment of cancer at the Argonne Cancer Research Hospital is demonstrated. Model Doris Charleston is seated beneath the X-ray beam. When the machine is in operation, the patient will be rotated under the beam. The Van de Graaf can also be used for producing a high-energy electron beam for potential use in the treatment of skin cancers. Others (left to right) are: Nurse Esther Colby and Dr. John Charles.
